# NSWindow.TabbingMode.automatic

**Case**

A window that automatically tabs together based on the user’s tabbing preference.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

A window with the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/TabbingMode-swift.enum/automatic] tabbing mode consults the value of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/userTabbingPreference-swift.type.property] to decide if it should join a tab group with other windows.

## Modes

- **NSWindow.TabbingMode.disallowed**: A window that explicitly does not prefer to tab together with other windows.
- **NSWindow.TabbingMode.preferred**: A window that explicitly prefers to tab together with other windows with the same tabbing identifier.
